Commands.Gale Fang: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Grants 1 stack of 「Last Hunter」 for 3 turns (max is 3)   「Last Hunter」 raises Max BRV, Attack and Defense
Commands.Shave Slash: Halves target's BRV  Followed by a 1-HIT melee BRV attack  Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Meteor Javelin: 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack repeated 4 times  Ignores Defense  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  At the last HP hit, deals 20% of total HP damage to other targets  Turns to 「Meteor Javelin+」 when attacking a broken target

Passives.Tempest Blow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Tempest Blow ,  Tempest Blow+
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Gale Fang Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Gale Fang ,  Gale Fang+
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Youth from the Future: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while  Last Hunter  is active
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed All: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Tempest Blow Extend: When using  Tempest Blow :- Increases number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRVWhen target is broken:- Turns  Tempest Blow  to  Tempest Blow+ with the following effects: + Resets target's BREAK state before the BRV attacks + Moderately raises BRV potency
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Gale Fang Extend: When using  Gale Fang :- Greatly raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhen target is broken:Turns  Gale Fang  to  Gale Fang+  with the following effects:- Moderately raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRVWhile  Last Hunter  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  Fearsiphon  with the following effects: + Increases number of BRV hits to 2 + Greatly raises total BRV potency + Lowers Action Delay if target is broken + Doesn't consume ability use count on next turn if target is broken- Turns  HP Attack  to  Scourge  with the following effects: + 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  + BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV + Turns to  Scourge+  when target is broken with the following effects:    Increases number of BRV hits to 2    BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Shave Slash Extend: When using  Shave Slash :- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Rune Tooth CP: 35: When using  Gale Fang ,  Gale Fang+ :- Raises BRV potency- Grants 1 additional stack of  Last Hunter  and extends its duration
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Shave Slash  use +1Duration of  Shave Slash  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Guardian's Edge CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Meteor Javelin
Weapons.Flame Fossil CP: 15: When using  Tempest Blow ,  Tempest Blow+ :- Raises BRV potency- If  Last Hunter  is active, grants 1 additional stack and extends its duration
